video.title: Love O2O
video.synopsis: When a computer-science major gets dumped by her “husband” in an online role-playing game, she attracts a new proposal from the game’s top player.

episodes.synopsis: Weiwei, an expert in online games abandoned by her virtual husband Wuxiang is asked by Naihe, a giant in online games, to be his virtual wife.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Nai's team is highly appreciated by investors in the mobile game show. Weiwei is ridiculed by Yaoyao's clan and vows to prove her innocence.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Naihe avenges Weiwei, who signs up for an internship with her roommates without knowing that Wuxiang is her new boss's son.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Weiwei impresses Guang. Wuxiang and Yaoyao uses a video to defame Weiwei. Naihe defeats Wuxiang and forces him to delete the video.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Guang challenges Nai to a basketball duel. Weiwei invites Naihe to participate in a video contest. Nai, the campus prince, sits next to Weiwei and causes a sensation.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Weiwei starts to imagine what Naihe is like in real life. After joining the online game, Guang mistakes Erxi for Weiwei and asks her to be his mentor.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Naihe helps Weiwei solve the hardest part of the Couple Task. Weiwei is questioned by the clan and decides to quit, Naihe gives his full support.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Weiwei and her roommates hear Nai has investor problems. Nai is hospitalized by an accident. Weiwei is frustrated when Naihe does not show up.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Weiwei realizes she is in love with Naihe. Guang asks Erxi about Weiwei's mood. Naihe invites Weiwei to meet him in real life.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Weiwei meets Naihe and finds out he is Nai. Nai takes Weiwei to his basketball match. Weiwei fears of being misunderstood, but Nai reassures her.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Nai's interaction with Weiwei causes a sensation in the campus. Weiwei and her roommates take Erxi to hospital. Nai takes the chance to take Weiwei on a date.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Weiwei is impressed by Nai's consideration for female players and his respect for his own game. Weiwei suspects Erxi is having an online love affair. Weiwei and Naihe help with in-game battles.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Naihe helps Wuxiang and Yaoyao. Nai plans to win the right to develop a next generation online game. Yiran shows up to a party and tries to win Nai's attention.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Nai rescues Yiran at the party and she mistakes it for attraction. Nai invites Weiwei's roommates to dinner, and runs into Yiran and Nai'er.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Guang is angry at Weiwei and Nai. Nai teaches Weiwei to play billiards. Weiwei feels lost when she and Nai are about to be separated for two months.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Weiwei cares about Nai but fears for the early exposure of their relationship. Weiwei works hard to buy a new phone, Nai goes up against a hacker.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Nai defeats and plans to ferret out the hacker. Weiwei gets a new phone and plays a prank on Nai. Weiwei returns to Nai's surprise and he kisses her.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Nai protects Weiwei from the rain and kisses her again. Nai arranges Weiwei's internship. Weiwei deals with Shuang, who is making things hard for her.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Shuang still has prejudice against Weiwei. Erxi works for Guang to repay debts. Weiwei catches cold while helping Shuang, making him feel sorry.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Guang fails to woo Weiwei and blames Erxi. Weiwei faints due to illness and Nai cares for her all night. Weiwei can't resist Nai's romantic advance.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Nai teaches Weiwei to swim. After their meeting, Diemeng tells Yaoyao's clan that Weiwei is a beauty. They mistake Erxi for Weiwei and tease her.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Erxi takes care of Guang's cat and they grow closer. Weiwei attends a gamer's meeting, Yaoyao's clan try to sow discord but Nai saves Weiwei's face.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Erxi blames Weiwei for her chagrin in the game. Weiwei asks Guang and learns the whole story. Guang apologies to Erxi, but she leaves in sadness.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Knowing that she owes everything to Weiwei, Erxi plans to move out. Nai comforts self-condemned Weiwei. Shaoxiang breaks up with Yaoyao and plans to pursue Weiwei.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: Shaoxiang tries to win Weiwei back and vows to defeat Nai. Guang texts Erxi but gets no response, Shuang is threatened by Nai's rival.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: Nai's team works hard to meet the deadline, Weiwei gives her full support. Yiran hates Weiwei more. Erxi confronts Guang and makes up with Weiwei.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: Nai gets inspiration from his date with Weiwei and achieves his optimization goal, but Shuang leaks info to his rival. Nai's parents come to visit.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: Weiwei makes up with Yiran. Nai resolves the crisis during the presentation and is highly praised. Shuang is allowed to resign with dignity.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: Wuxiang apologies to Weiwei, Nai says he shall await his fair challenge. Two years later, Nai addresses Weiwei as his fiancée in an interview.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: Nai proposes to Weiwei publicly in an interview and passes the test of Weiwei's father. They finally get married and live happily ever after.
episodes.title: Episode 30
